content: You can't view Flash content on an iPad. However, you can easily email yourself the URLs of these web pages and view that content on your regular computer when you get home.
translations: ita:Non si riescono a visualizzare i contenuti Flash su un iPad. Tuttavia, ci si pu√≤ facilmente inviare tramite e-mail gli U
